scripts.prepublish: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.coverage: VASHPATH=../../index.js VASHRUNTIMEPATH=../../runtime.js browserify -t envify -t coverify test/vows/vash.test.js | node | coverify
scripts.build: browserify index.js --standalone vash > build/vash.js && browserify --standalone vash runtime.js > build/vash-runtime.js && browserify --standalone vash --external fs --external path lib/helpers/index.js > build/vash-runtime-all.js
